name: inkog
description: AI agent security platform with vulnerability scanning, AGENTS.md governance verification, EU AI Act compliance, and MLBOM generation. Purpose-built for LangChain, CrewAI, LangGraph, n8n, and other agent frameworks.

tools.name: inkog_scan
tools.description: Scan AI agent code for security vulnerabilities including prompt injection, infinite loops, token bombing, SQL injection via LLM, and governance gaps

tools.name: inkog_verify_governance
tools.description: Validate that AGENTS.md declarations match actual code behavior. Unique capability for EU AI Act Article 14 compliance

tools.name: inkog_compliance_report
tools.description: Generate compliance reports for EU AI Act, NIST AI RMF, ISO 42001, or OWASP LLM Top 10

tools.name: inkog_explain_finding
tools.description: Get detailed explanation and remediation guidance for a security finding or pattern

tools.name: inkog_audit_mcp_server
tools.description: Security audit any MCP server from the registry or GitHub repository

tools.name: inkog_generate_mlbom
tools.description: Generate a Machine Learning Bill of Materials (MLBOM) in CycloneDX or SPDX format

tools.name: inkog_audit_a2a
tools.description: Audit Agent-to-Agent (A2A) communications in multi-agent systems for security risks

auth.instructions: Get your free API key at https://app.inkog.io

examples.title: Scan for vulnerabilities
examples.prompt: Use Inkog to scan my agent code for security vulnerabilities

examples.title: Verify governance
examples.prompt: Verify that my AGENTS.md declarations match the actual code behavior

examples.title: Generate compliance report
examples.prompt: Generate an EU AI Act compliance report for my AI agent

examples.title: Audit MCP server
examples.prompt: Audit the GitHub MCP server for security issues
